sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners

Interface ListenerProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Nameable, Provider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DebugListenerProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractListenerProvider, DebugListenerProviderProxy, ForwardingListenerProvider

    public interface ListenerProvider
extends Provider
    An object responsible for providing Listener instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ListenerProvider.Builder
      A builder for creating listener provider instances.

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • forClass

        <L extends Listener> L forClass(java.lang.Class<L> implementation)
        Returns an instance of the specified listener implementation class.

        This method is guaranteed to return the same listener instance for the specified implementation class every time it is invoked.

        Parameters:
        implementation - the listener implementation class
        Returns:
        the listener
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified listener implementation class is null
        IllegalListenerClassException - if the listener implementation class is invalid
        ListenerInstantiationException - if the listener instantiation failed

      • loadClass

        java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> loadClass(java.lang.String name)
                                              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads a listener implementation class with the specified binary name.
        Parameters:
        name - the binary name of the listener implementation class, not an empty string or null
        Returns:
        the listener implementation class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified class name is an empty string
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified class name is null
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class was not found
        IllegalListenerClassException - if the listener implementation class is invalid

      • classes

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends Listener>> classes()
        Returns implementation classes of all provided listeners.

      • parent

        ListenerProvider parent()
        Returns the listener provider's parent or null if there is no parent. Standard implementations should return system listener provider if there is no direct parent (only the system listener provider returns null as it is at the top of the listener provider hierarchy).
        Specified by:
        parent in interface Provider
        See Also:
        ResourceProviders.getSystemProvider()

      • equals

        boolean equals(@Nullable
             java.lang.Object o)
        Compares the specified object with this provider for equality. Returns true if the specified object is also provider and the two providers have the same name. This definition ensures that this method works properly across different implementations of the provider interface.
        Specified by:
        equals in interface Provider
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be compared for equality with this provider
        Returns:
        true if the specified object is equal to this provider, false otherwise

      • hashCode

        int hashCode()
        Returns the hash code value for this provider. The hash code of a provider should be equivalent to the hash code of the provider's name.
        Specified by:
        hashCode in interface Provider
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the hash code value for this provider
